DOC.brief_summary: To assess the efficacy of MK0524 on seasonal allergies.
DOC.criteria: Person has had at least 2 years of seasonal allergies Person has had a positive skin test to at least 1 of the allergens of the season Person is a nonsmoker Person has been hospitalized within the last 4 weeks Person is a female who has had a baby within the last 8 weeks or is still breastfeeding
